message.content:
cs.DB, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with record linkage, which is a common problem in databases (cs.DB) and information retrieval (cs.IR). The use of rule-based matching algorithms and machine learning also suggests a connection to artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The proposed system also involves efficient decomposition of the search space, which is a technique commonly used in data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). Finally, the paper discusses the scalability of the system, which is a topic often studied in machine learning and data mining (cs.LG).
